short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add sound effects to Google Chrome with Sounds Plus!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web browsing can be so quiet and boring. Have some fun with sound effects. With Sounds Plus you can add sound effects the many events, such as creating a new tab, or pasting text. This extension will change your web browsing experience.
